page.title: 03 HIGH POST FARM - WEST ROW
page.content: HIGH POST FARM IS A MIXED FARM OF SOME 112 ACRES.IT IS LOCATED ALONG HURDLE DROVE IN THE AREA KNOWN AS MILDENHALL FEN.MOST OF THIS LAND IS DRY AND SANDY AND NEEDS IRRIGATING IN DRY WEATHER. THE FARMER KEEPS SOME 150 BEEF CATTLE,100 BREEDING EWES AND 300 PIGS. HE GROWS POTATOES,CORN AND GRASS. THE NEIGHBOURING FARM IS OWNED BY HIS BROTHER AND THE TWO FARMS ARE WORKED AS ONE UNIT WITH ONE FULL-TIME WORKER AND HELP FROM THE FAMILY. THERE ARE NO SET HOURS,THE FARMER WORKS TILL ALL THE JOBS ARE DONE, BUT POTATO HARVESTING AND LAMBING ARE VERY BUSY TIMES ON THIS FARM. 'SPARKY' IS THE FARM DOG,A PLAYFUL ANIMAL BUT A GOOD GUARD DOG.A LEGION OF FARM CATS KEEP THE SHEDS-FULL OF PIG FEED-FREE FROM RATS.
